column5: Three of us got out yesterday for some crappies. Figured a smaller lake would be safer as ice conditions are very poor everywhere.we walked out on the lake a couple of hundred yards in a foot of snow and water.i drilled first hole which took two seconds, only had 4"of ice.its enough but i like it a little thicker myself. No crappies but got into a few walleyes and some pike and perch. Nice to get out.doesnt look good for getting out for the lake trout opener on January 1 st.bigger lakes are pretty scary still.picture is the first fish we caught.good way to start the season.
Nice going. Only 4" of ice? there is a foot on the Goon ..
Tried to plow a path today out in front of the house, to where I want to put the ice shack. This is what I got into, SLUSHhttps://www.dropbox.com/s/r8lb1zq9oq...60%29.jpg?dl=0
